>>> from torque import torque

>>> torque(10,10,90)
6.123233995736766e-15

>>> torque(10,10)
6.123233995736766e-15

>>> torque(5,10, 120)
-24.99999999999999

>>> torque(-4, 10)
-2.4492935982947065e-15

>>> torque(-5, 10, -280)
-8.682408883346499

>>> torque(0,0)
0.0

>>> torque(150, 1, -100)
-26.047226650039544

>>> torque(1000, 250)
1.5308084989341916e-11

>>> torque(50, 216, 25)
9788.124099995819

>>> torque(2, 5, 3)
9.986295347545738
